name: Robert De Niro Sr.
summary: Robert De Niro Sr.. Robert De Niro Sr. was born on 3 May 1922 in Syracuse, New York, USA. He was previously married to Virginia Holton Admiral. He died on 3 May 1993 in New York City, New York, USA.
